0871A46B.Toast: Zurke must kill the sweet sickness he has so lovingly cultivated.

0BDB18BB.Callback23Header: Protect Zurke as he completes the ritual

1D9AD41F.Callback54Header: Follow Clone Questgiver to Location B

1EF99359.Phase40Description: The Blood Fungus was added to Samil’s corpse. I should speak to Zurke and ask him the next step in the cleansing.

24EC6278.Callback20Header: Place the Blood Fungus on Samil’s corpse.

4408F5DB.Phase24Description: In the heart of flesh mound, Zurke is to perform a cleansing ritual. He warned me this use of magic would awaken the swamp and attract peril. I need to protect Zurke while he concentrates.

9F4BFA3B.Phase51Description: The ritual is completed and the swamp is quiet. Zurke wishes to speak with me at the flesh mound.

B12EDDB8.Phase21Description:
The mound of flesh and rot is unmistakably the swamp sickness’ origin. I found Zurke here who brought along Samil’s corpse. 

Zurke wishes me to place the Blood Fungus I collected unto the decayed body.

B87761DE.Phase18Description: The Blood Fungus has been collected from the corpsefiend. Zurke told me to travel south to the sickness’ origin. He will be waiting for me there.

E36BD6A1.Phase66Description: I have given Zurke the piece of uncorrupted flesh. He believes he now knows the cure for the swamp sickness. I should speak to him about the next steps.

FAF02F4B.Phase6Description:
Zurke is almost ready to cure the sickness he inflicted upon the swamp but he’s missing the last ingredient – blood fungus. He is growing the parasitic fungi on a corpsefiend. 

It should be roaming outside of the Ancient Reservoir in the Looming Edifice.
